page.title: 13Community Police,Mexborough
page.content: The Mexborough Community Policeman. There are lots of jobs in the police force and one of them is the job of the community policeman. We talked to our community policeman and asked him questions about his work. He explained about his experience at his job, and we learned how he mingles with people in the town and gets to know them well. He can arrive at the scene of any trouble before it develops any further or before it even starts. He knows many individuals personally and many people know him by sight and by name. They also know where to find him at home. In Mexborough library there are posters that say "This is your community policeman" with a photo underneath and his name and address.
